description: Try our easy to follow Toastie Tower recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toastie Tower Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 sweet spiced gherkins (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat sandwich press. Cut sourdough flatbread into four equal pieces and split through the centre.

Spread each bread base with 1 tsp Dijon mustard. Top with 1 slice Jarlsberg cheese, 1 slice ham, 1 sliced gherkin, parsley leaves and finish with another slice Jarlsberg cheese. Top with remaining bread, cutsides down.
Toast in sandwich press for 5 minutes or until golden brown and cheese has melted. Cut diagonally and stack on a plate. Serve with extra gherkins, securing with a skewer.
